Nov. 17th 3
Lieut. Samuel G. Martin
Co "A" 37th Regt. Ky. Vols.
Glasgow
Sir,

Lieut. Col. Spalding -- 37th Ky vols. having forwarded to his Excellency -- the Governor statements prejudicial to your moral and loyal character -- that you had been actively engaged in promoting the rebel cause -- I am instructed to inform you, that your commission as first Lieutenant of Co (A) 37th Ky Vols is hereby revoked, and will be regarded as never having been issued.

Respectfully
Your obt Servt
John Boyle
Adjt. Gen. of Ky.
